name: Shapecaster
description:
This is a roguelike created over 7 days during (but not officially submitted to) the Community Game Jam hosted by Brackeys, Sykoo, Jabrils and others. 

It's a turnbased roguelike-ish cardgame-ish tetris-ish score attack game made in Unity 2019.2. All art, code and sound made by me, Matt Mirrorfish. I'll do a video soon for YouTube breaking down the process.

Because I work for Unity and we're a sponsor I figured it wasn't appropriate for me to actually enter the competition, but I wanted to make a game anyway. This is it!
